about_the_game:
Unleash Your Inner Dragon in This Thrilling Side-Scrolling Brawler!

In Heroes of Mount Dragon, you’ll step into the shoes of one of 8 unique heroes who can transform into powerful dragons! Whether you’re teaming up with friends or battling solo, prepare for fast-paced, side-scrolling combat against hordes of enemies. With intuitive controls and a deep set of moves, you’ll face off in epic battles, unleash devastating combos, and unlock powerful upgrades as you progress.

DEMO CONTENT

  • Choose from 4 of the 8 unique heroes, each with their own abilities and fighting styles.

  • Battle through relentless waves of enemies by managing your hero's unique moves and powerful upgrades. Transform into a mighty dragon to take on increasingly tough enemies

  • Team up with up to 3 friends to defeat evil!

  • Explore half of the first kingdom (out of 4) of this visually charming adventure.

The demo concludes upon defeating the villainous Bismarck The Destroyer.

Please note that many features, including our super-fun competitive mode, are not available in this demo. Progress made in the demo will not carry over to the full game.

Are you ready for the ultimate dragon showdown?
